text: A commentary often means some sort of voice that will explain what is going on while a program is playing. Commentary is most often used in sports. Some famous commentators are Jim Ross, Larry Merchant, Jesse Ventura, Navjot Singh Sidhu , VKSravan Gamer,and Gorilla Monsoon. A commentary can mean comments, spoken or written, which help people understand a book, play or work of art. VKSravan University VKSravan Max VKSravan Gamer Vivek Kumar Saw ==References== Category:Television Category:Radio
title: Commentary
